test_message: Research current trends in the chocolate snacking market, focusing on premium chocolate bars, health-conscious options, and major competitor activities in Q1 2024.

market_trends.trend: Growing demand for premium chocolate bars
market_trends.description: Consumers are increasingly seeking high-quality, artisanal chocolate options that offer unique flavors and ethical sourcing.
Healthier options, including dark chocolates with higher cocoa content and low-sugar formulations, are gaining popularity among consumers concerned about health and wellness.

competitor_activities.activity: Launch of new bean-to-bar premium chocolate line
Rebranding of health-focused chocolate products with new packaging and ingredients

industry_news.headline: Rising cocoa prices impact chocolate snack production
industry_news.summary: Increased global demand and supply chain disruptions have led to a significant rise in cocoa prices, affecting manufacturers and pushing for product reformulations.

industry_news.headline: Regulatory changes in food labeling for health claims
industry_news.summary: New regulations are being implemented around health claims on snack foods, affecting how chocolate products market their health benefits.

demographic_shifts: Increased interest from Gen Z consumers

strategic_implications: Invest in premium product lines to capture market share
Focus on transparency and health-conscious marketing strategies
